products.title: Tree Bark Ash
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 500mm max drop: 4000mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm & 127mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
